// HUD - arrow on social button

//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.30.9200.16384
    ps_3_0
    dcl_color v0
    dcl_color1 v1.w
    dcl_texcoord v2
    dcl_texcoord1 v3

def c221, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13

    mov r0, v0
    mov r1, v3
    mad r0, r0, r1, v2
    mul oC0.w, r0.w, v1.w
    mov oC0.xyz, r0

// approximately 5 instruction slots used


// Shader disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py --disable=0 --condition=c220.x -i -f PixelShader_66_CRC32_5FE66BE5.txt
mov r31.w, c220.x
if_eq r31.w, c221.x
mov oC0.xyzw, c221.xxxx
endif
